title: Bitwarden Seeder Preset
description: Defines a complete seeding preset that composes organization, users, groups, collections, and ciphers.

organization.description: Organization configuration. Use 'fixture' for a named fixture, or 'name'+'domain' for inline creation.

fixture.description: Name of an organization fixture file (e.g., 'dunder-mifflin').

name.description: Organization display name (used with inline creation).

domain.description: Organization domain (used with inline creation and generator seeding).

seats.description: Number of seats in the organization.

roster.description: Named roster fixture for users, groups, and collections.

fixture.description: Name of a roster fixture file (e.g., 'dunder-mifflin').

realisticStatusMix.description: When true and count >= 10, creates realistic mix: 85% Confirmed, 5% Invited, 5% Accepted, 5% Revoked.

groups.description: Generate random groups with round-robin user assignment.

collections.description: Generate random collections with user assignments.

ciphers.description: Cipher configuration. Use 'fixture' for a named fixture, or 'count' for random generation.

fixture.description: Name of a cipher fixture file (e.g., 'autofill-testing').

count.description: Number of random ciphers to generate.
